jobs.title: Junior Software Engineer
jobs.description: Designing and developing scalable backend systems using Django REST Framework and FastAPI in a microservices architecture. Integrated OpenAI APIs to deliver AI-powered features, implemented JWT and cookie-based authentication with social login support, and optimized PostgreSQL data models using SQLAlchemy. Collaborating in Agile sprints with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality production-ready features.

jobs.title: Software Engineer Intern
jobs.description: I Engineered and deployed Python based web applications using Django, Redis for caching, and Celery for task queue management. I enhanced database efficiency by optimizing schemas, which sped up data storage and retrieval while reducing server load. I also played a key role in accelerating microservices development and deployment by leveraging gRPC, SQLAlchemy, FastAPI, and Docker, resulting in a 30% faster time-to-market for new features. Additionally, I explored methods to visualize and send daily reports of test results to team members, improving communication and decision making processes.
